trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref uid="langword_csharp_webControls" name="webControls" href=""></xref> section.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_webControls" name="webControls" href=""> </xref> > 一節。

trans-unit.source: The WebControlsSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `webControls` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: WebControlsSection 類別可用來以程式設計方式存取和修改`webControls`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET provides a shared location for the client script files, where they can be accessed from multiple pages and across applications.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 提供的共用的位置的用戶端指令碼檔案，其中它們可以可從多個頁面和存取跨應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The WebControlsSection can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: WebControlsSection 可以讀取和寫入資訊的相關區段的區段屬性，<xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>其值為<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition></xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>根據組態檔

trans-unit.source: The WebControlsSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: WebControlsSection 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebControlsSection>
取得用戶端指令碼位置。

trans-unit.source: For details about the client scripts and their use, refer to [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關用戶端指令碼及其用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[用戶端指令碼中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The location of the client scripts.
